titleStmt.title: Differences in matters of religion, betweene the easterne and westerne churches VVherein the Romane Church may see her selfe charged with as many errours, as shee falsly layeth to the charge of other churches in Europe. Gathered by Irenæus Rodoginus.
titleStmt.author: Rodoginus, Irenaeus.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Augustine Mathevves for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at the signe of the Windmill in Britaines-Burse,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Differences betweene the easterne and westerne churches.
Variant: imprint has ".. signe of the Harrow in Britaines Burse. ..".

place.placeName: the signe of the Windmill in Britaines-Burse
